title: 床放在地上按右键怎么不能设置复活点？
author: wusitade
txt_content: 我刚刚看了一下我的帖子，基本上都是求助贴，还是RT，RT，RT！！

replies.author: ToNick
replies.txt_content: 床要放到房子里，必须满足房子的要求

replies.author: wusitade
replies.txt_content:
回复 papermoon 的帖子

那几样要求？我设置齐全啊，工作台、桌、椅、火把，吊灯、门背景墙都有了啊，怎么还是不行？

replies.author: ToNick
replies.txt_content:
回复 wusitade 的帖子

    The bed must have enough space. 12 block wide and 6 blocks high is enough.
    The room must contain at least one light source (for example, a Torch or Candle ).
    The room's exterior walls must be crafted from material other than dirt such as wood, stone, or bricks .
    The background wall must also be crafted from a material other than dirt.
    If the requirements are met, right clicking the bed should set your spawn and show the message "Spawn point set!".
    You however can't sleep in the bed, for this function does not yet work.

replies.author: wusitade
replies.txt_content:
回复 papermoon 的帖子

....................，拿去有道翻译= =

replies.author: wusitade
replies.txt_content:
回复 papermoon 的帖子

原来是高度问题，谢谢了
